testimonial1.quote: During our 30-day POC, we detected a coordinated fraud ring that our previous system missed entirely. The AI agents identified patterns across 15+ seemingly unrelated accounts.

testimonial3.quote: Integration was seamless. We had the POC running in our staging environment within 2 hours using their REST API. The documentation is exceptional.
testimonial3.author: CTO

professional.name: Professional

faq.q1: How does the POC program work?
faq.a1: Our 30-day POC lets you evaluate the platform with your real data. We provide dedicated onboarding support to ensure you can fully test our fraud detection capabilities.
faq.a2: After the POC, you can choose the plan that best fits your transaction volume and feature requirements. We'll help migrate your configuration seamlessly.
faq.q3: Can I customize the AI agents?
faq.a3: Yes, on Professional and Enterprise plans, you can configure custom rules and thresholds. Enterprise customers can also request custom model training.
faq.a4: Our SLA covers uptime guarantees, response time commitments, and support availability. Enterprise SLAs include dedicated support channels and faster response times.

useCasesPage.title: Industry
useCasesPage.subtitle: Tailored fraud prevention for your specific industry challenges

financial.title: Financial Services Fraud Prevention
financial.challenge: Financial institutions face sophisticated fraud attacks including payment fraud, account takeover, and money laundering schemes that can result in millions in losses.
financial.solution: Our 6 AI agents provide real-time detection of payment fraud, account takeover attempts, and suspicious money movement patterns with sub-second response times.

ecommerce.title: E-Commerce Fraud Prevention
ecommerce.challenge: Online retailers struggle with transaction fraud, promo abuse, account takeover, and high chargeback rates that erode margins and customer trust.
ecommerce.solution: Multi-agent fraud detection identifies fraudulent orders, promotional abuse, and account compromise before transactions complete.

insurance.title: Insurance Claims Fraud Detection
insurance.challenge: Insurance companies lose billions annually to fraudulent claims, staged accidents, application fraud, and premium fraud schemes.
insurance.solution: AI agents analyze claims patterns, detect staged events, verify applicant information, and identify premium fraud rings.

healthcare.title: Healthcare Fraud Prevention
healthcare.challenge: Healthcare organizations face medical billing fraud, identity theft, prescription fraud, and provider fraud that impact both finances and patient care.
healthcare.solution: Specialized agents detect billing anomalies, verify patient identity, flag suspicious prescriptions, and identify provider fraud patterns.

ecommerce.benefit1: Stop card testing attacks within seconds

banking.title: Banking & Fintech
banking.description: Monitor wire transfers, ACH transactions, and mobile payments for money laundering, account takeover, and unauthorized transfers.

hero.title: REDUCE CHARGEBACKS BY
hero.subtitle: Prevent friendly fraud and reduce chargeback costs with AI-powered dispute prevention

benefits.title: Chargeback Prevention Benefits
benefits.subtitle: Protect revenue and maintain payment processor relationships

reduce.title: 80%+ Reduction
reduce.description: Reduce chargeback rates by identifying friendly fraud, first-party fraud, and authorization disputes before they occur.

protect.title: Protect Merchant Status
protect.description: Stay below payment processor thresholds and avoid excessive chargeback programs that threaten your ability to accept payments.

revenue.title: Recover Revenue
revenue.description: Win more disputes with compelling evidence packages automatically generated from transaction data and fraud signals.

step1.title: Pre-Transaction Screening
step1.description: Analyze risk signals before authorizing transactions. Flag high-risk patterns that typically lead to chargebacks such as velocity abuse, BIN attacks, and suspicious shipping addresses.

step2.title: Real-Time Alerts
step2.description: Receive instant notifications when high-risk transactions occur. Option to block, challenge with step-up authentication, or allow with additional monitoring.

step3.title: Chargeback Prediction
step3.description: Machine learning models predict chargeback probability based on transaction characteristics, customer history, and fraud signals. Intervene proactively.

step4.title: Evidence Automation
step4.description: Automatically compile compelling evidence packages when disputes occur. Include transaction logs, device fingerprints, IP data, and communication history.

roi.title: Calculate Your Chargeback Savings
roi.description: See how much you could save by reducing chargeback rates and operational costs

cta.title: Reduce Chargebacks Starting Today
cta.description: Join merchants protecting billions in transactions from chargebacks

hero.title: FRAUD DETECTION
hero.subtitle: Integrate AI-powered fraud detection in minutes with comprehensive REST APIs and SDKs

features.title: API Features
features.subtitle: Developer-friendly fraud detection built for production

rest.title: RESTful API
rest.description: Simple REST API with JSON responses. Analyze transactions, verify identities, and access fraud scores with single HTTP requests.

security.title: Enterprise Security
security.description: OAuth 2.0 authentication, API key rotation, IP whitelisting, and rate limiting. Bank-grade encryption for all data in transit.

realtime.title: Real-Time Processing
realtime.description: Sub-second response times for fraud analysis. WebSocket support for real-time alerts and investigation updates.

sdks.title: Official SDKs & Libraries
sdks.subtitle: Native support for popular programming languages

cta.title: Start Building Today
cta.description: Get your API key and start integrating fraud detection in minutes

hero.title: STOP ACCOUNT
hero.subtitle: Detect compromised accounts and unauthorized access in real-time with behavioral AI

biometrics.title: Behavioral Biometrics
biometrics.description: Analyze typing patterns, mouse movements, and navigation behavior to detect when someone else is using an accountâ€”even with correct credentials.

behavioral.title: Behavioral Analysis
behavioral.description: Monitor login patterns, session behavior, and activity sequences. Detect anomalies like unusual login times, rapid actions, or deviation from normal workflows.

anomaly.title: Anomaly Detection
anomaly.description: Machine learning models trained on millions of legitimate sessions identify subtle signals of account compromise invisible to rule-based systems.

item1.title: Credential Stuffing Protection
item1.description: Block automated login attempts using stolen username/password combinations from data breaches. Detect patterns across failed login attempts.

item2.title: Step-Up Authentication
item2.description: Trigger additional authentication (2FA, email verification, SMS) when suspicious activity is detected, balancing security with user experience.

item3.title: Device Fingerprinting
item3.description: Track and analyze device characteristics. Alert when accounts are accessed from new devices or suspicious locations.

item4.title: Session Monitoring
item4.description: Continuously monitor active sessions for signs of takeover. Automatically terminate suspicious sessions to prevent damage.

item5.title: Risk-Based Authentication
item5.description: Adjust authentication requirements based on real-time risk scores. High-risk logins require additional verification.

cta.title: Protect Your Users' Accounts
cta.description: Stop account takeover attacks before damage occurs

hero.title: STOP PAYMENT
hero.subtitle: Block stolen cards, card testing, and synthetic fraud before transactions complete

cardTesting.title: Card Testing Attacks
cardTesting.description: Detect and block automated bots testing stolen credit card numbers with small transactions. Stop attacks before hundreds of fraudulent purchases occur.

stolenCards.title: Stolen Card Detection
stolenCards.description: Identify transactions using compromised payment credentials through velocity checks, BIN analysis, and cross-merchant fraud networks.

synthetic.title: Synthetic Identity Fraud
synthetic.description: Catch fraudsters combining real and fake information to create new identities for payment fraud. Detect inconsistencies across data sources.

cta.title: Secure Your Payment Flow
cta.description: Protect revenue and reduce fraud losses with AI-powered payment fraud detection

hero.title: AUTOMATED
hero.subtitle: Verify user identities in seconds with AI-powered document analysis and biometric matching

document.title: Document Verification
document.description: AI-powered OCR and fraud detection for driver's licenses, passports, and national IDs. Detect photo manipulation, template fraud, and forged documents.

biometric.title: Biometric Matching
biometric.description: Compare selfies to government IDs using facial recognition. Ensure the person presenting credentials is the rightful owner.

liveness.title: Liveness Detection
liveness.description: Prevent spoofing attacks using photos, videos, or masks. Require real-time user interaction to prove physical presence.

cta.title: Verify Identities at Scale
cta.description: Onboard users quickly while preventing identity fraud

hero.title: DETECT & BLOCK
hero.subtitle: Stop automated fraud, scraping, and account creation with advanced bot detection

behavioral.title: Behavioral Analysis
behavioral.description: Distinguish human behavior from bot patterns. Analyze mouse movements, click patterns, typing speed, and navigation sequences.

network.title: Network Analysis
network.description: Detect datacenter IPs, VPNs, proxies, and Tor networks. Identify bot traffic patterns and coordinated attacks.

realtime.title: Real-Time Blocking
realtime.description: Block malicious bots instantly while allowing legitimate automation (search engines, monitoring tools). Challenge suspicious traffic with CAPTCHA when needed.

cta.title: Stop Bot Attacks Today
cta.description: Protect your platform from automated fraud and abuse
